column4: Hi - I use crossover w/ outlook for MS exchange mailbox. I am using ubuntu 10.10 and I'm looking for a good tool to search through my mail. Does anyone else use this combination and what tools are used for searching the Exchange inbox?
i believe it can index exchange server emails
What about GNOME DO, is there a way to get GNOME DO to index my mail? This way I can simply search my mail by invoking GNOME DO with super + space then begin typing keywords.
